Platform
Spaces Included

Spaces keep your related Builder content in one place. The same space can be used for any number of projects that share the content you build.

Create new spaces for projects that won't use the content in an existing space.

Learn more about spaces

Users Included

A user seat is required to access the Builder.io platform to create, edit, and manage content. Viewing live and draft content does not require a User seat.

Learn more about users and user seats

Visual Copilot
Code Generations

"Fast" and "Quality" code generations count towards your total allocation. "Fast" generations are lower quality but generate code nearly instantaneously. "Quality" generations are higher quality but take longer to generate.

20
500
2500
Custom
Context Window

Context window is the size limit for each quality code generation. The code is broken down into tokens and the total amount of tokens sent to and received back from the AI model is the context size, and that size must stay within the the context window limit for each subscription plan.

4k
128k
128k
128k
Visual Headless CMS
Visual Views

Visual views (aka Builder pageviews) are tracked by a pixel we add to content created in Builder and rendered by a customer's site or app. It works similar to how Google Analytics would measure a page view.

You can purchase additional visual views directly in the platform. The cost an additional 10k monthly visual views is $6/month (or $5/month if paid annually) on the Basic plan and $8/month (or $6/month if paid annually) on the Growth plan.

Learn more about how we track page views

Key Features
Drag-and-Drop Visual Editor

Builder's Visual Editor allows you and your team to drag-and-drop web content and edit on the fly. Learn more about how the Visual Editor works

Visual Editor AI

BETA

Generate content and images within the visual editor using AI. Learn more

Components-only Mode

Restrict visual building to only leverage your design systems and component libraries - Learn More

Template Library

Leverage our library of hundreds of page and section templates, and build your own template library too

Real-time, Multiplayer

Real-time collaborative editing - have multiple users in the same content entry live editing and working together. Learn More

Commenting

Leave comments directly in Builder to centralize feedback - Learn more

AI Figma Import

Import Figma designs to the Builder Visual Editor with the Builder.io Figma plugin. Learn more

AI Code Generation

Use AI to turn Figma designs into clean, responsive, React, Vue, Svelte, Angular, Qwik, Solid, or HTML code. Learn more

Component Mapping

BETA

Map your Figma components to your code components so that Visual Copilot can include them in your generated code.

Headless CMS

Seamlessly manage and deliver content across any site, app, or platform. Learn how our headless CMS makes a difference.

Global CDN

All content APIs are available via CDN, edge cached, and delivered globally

Image Optimization

Automatically generate images in different formats and sizes for all devices and platforms to improve performance without sacrificing quality - Learn More

Asset Manager

Organize and optimize your assets - Learn More

Built-in Plugins

Leverage a wide range of pre-built integrations - Learn More

Standard Roles

There are 4 standard user roles: Admin, Developer, Designer, Editor. Learn more

Localization

Localize whole pages, or at block level. Learn more about localization

Targeting & Segmentation

Target content by any attribute or data you have (e.g. locale, logged in/out, previous shopping behavior, UTM parameters, etc). Learn more about targeting

A/B Testing

High-performing, blazing fast A/B testing and multivariate testing. Learn more about A/B testing

Scheduling

Schedule content to publish and/or unpublish at a future time. Learn more about scheduling

Analytics

Track impressions, clicks, conversions, and any custom events. And send data to your own analytics providers.

Heatmaps

Track engagement via heat maps based on clicks and conversions. Since your content lives in Builder, the heat map tracking is incredibly performant and doesn't impact page speed or site performance. Learn how to use heatmaps

Single Sign-On

Supports all major SAML and OIDC single-sign on providers. Check out how it works

Private Plugins

Build out connectors to any homegrown, proprietary or third party software or systems you need. Learn how to set up private plugins

Studio tab

Visually preview all your content -- whether scheduled, localized, personalized, etc. -- all in one place within the Builder platform

Environments

Create pre-production environments to test ideas and functionality, and easily push to production when ready. Learn more

Locale Grouping

More efficiently create and manage content for a large number of locales. Learn more

Usage Dashboards

Understand how your users are leveraging the Builder platform - Learn More

Custom Roles & Permissions

Create customizable user roles and permission to control access and user capabilities. Learn more

Add-on
Rules & Workflows

Define and manage rules that align with your company's internal processes. Set specific criteria for publishing content entries or for moving them through a Workflow process. Learn more

Add-on
Frequently Asked Questions

See common questions below, check out our knowledge base, or get in touch with one of our team members via chat.

So, subscriptions are per space, but what is a space?

Spaces (aka workspaces) are content repositories that house content, models, and data tied to a specific project. If you have multiple projects (e.g. multiple websites, apps) that don't share content then those are best managed via separate spaces. If you have multiple projects that do share content then you'd want to manage those projects via the same space. You can choose different subscriptions for different spaces based on your needs. Learn more about spaces here.

What is a visual view and how is it measured?

Visual views (aka Builder pageviews) are tracked by a pixel we add to visual content created in in the Visual Editor (using a visual page model or visual section model) and rendered by a customer's site or app. Content from Data models do not count as part of your page views, and are effectively free in this regard. For Data models, Builder only uses bandwidth metering. Learn more

Do you charge for content types and entries?

No! We do not want arbitrary limits to impact architectural decisions.Therefore, we offer unlimited content models, content entries, and API requests for all accounts.

Do you offer a free trial?

Yes, we want everyone to experience the full power of Builder so every new space has a 30-day free trial for both our Basic and Growth plans. Each trial allows you to access the respective plan's features. Note that the 30-day trial is universal, so it won't add up if you try both plans. When the trial ends, you'll be prompted to choose the plan that best fits your needs.

What if I hit my context window limit?

You will either need to upgrade your plan or reduce the size of the design file for which you're generating quality code. For example, instead of generating quality code for a whole page, limit it to just a section of a page at at time.

What if I need to add more users?

No problem! Both our Basic and Growth plans come with one seat included. If you need additional user seats, you can purchase them directly on the platform. For the Basic plan, each additional seat is $24/month ($19/month if billed annually). On the Growth plan, extra seats are priced at $49/month ($39/month if billed annually).

Should you need more than the allowed seats under these plans, an Enterprise solution might be best. Feel free to contact sales@builder.io for more details.

What if I need to add more visual views?

Both our Basic and Growth plans start with 100k monthly visual views. If you need more, you can purchase additional visual views directly in the platform. The cost for each extra set of views is $6/month (or $5/month if paid annually) on the Basic plan and $8/month (or $6/month if paid annually) on the Growth plan. Typically, if your needs exceed a large number of visual views, an Enterprise plan might be the best fit. For inquiries about higher tiers or custom requirements, please reach out to sales@builder.io.

What if I need more bandwidth?

There is a fair use limit on bandwidth based on your plan's visual views. For example, all paid plans come with 100k monthly visual views, which includes a fair use limit of 100 GB of bandwidth. For every 10k monthly visual views you add to your plan, your fair use limit increases by an additional 10 GB of bandwidth.

Bandwidth is the measure of data that Builder delivers on your site. Bandwidth is consumed when a web page loads assets, files, and content that you have stored in Builder. Read more about how you can keep up with your data usage.

What if I'm using a static site generator (e.g. Next.js, Gatsby)?

That's great! Builder supports any static site generator. Note: our pricing applies to any type of integration whether you're fully caching the content on your end, self-hosting the content, or building server-side rendered / static sites with us.

Not sure which plan is right for you?
